## ProductReviewRating interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ProductReviewRating 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [name](./magento-api.productreviewrating.name.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The label assigned to an aspect of a product that is being rated, such as quality or price |
|  [value](./magento-api.productreviewrating.value.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The rating value given by customer. By default, possible values range from 1 to 5. |
